document_data.name: Kastrandrethilian
document_data.mainbody: '''Kastrandrethilian''' was a [[silver dragon]] [[paladin]] of [[Xymor]] ([[Bahamut]]) and a member of the [[Talons of Justice]].
document_data.Lair: Kastrandrethilian's lair was located somewhere in the western [[Galena Mountains]].
document_data.Activities: As of [[1374 DR]], Kastrandrethilian was one of the few known members of the Talons.
